description: This is the main page component for a notes application built with React and Next.js. It manages the state and interactions for listing, viewing, editing, and deleting notes, as well as handling a modal for note creation and editing.

methods.name: handleAdd
methods.description: Opens the modal for creating a new note.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves a new or edited note, updating the notes list and closing the modal.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note by id from the notes list.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Prepares a note for editing by opening the modal with the note's data.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Selects a note by id to view its details.
